workItems.title: Gather requirements
workItems.content: Collect all necessary requirements from stakeholders.

workItems.title: Research competitors
workItems.content: Analyze competitor websites for design inspiration.

workItems.title: Create wireframes
workItems.content: Design wireframes for the new website layout.

workItems.title: Review homepage mockup
workItems.content: Get feedback on the homepage mockup from the team.

workItems.title: Finalize color palette
workItems.content: Confirm the color palette for the redesign.

workItems.title: Define MVP features
workItems.content: List and prioritize features for the first app release.

workItems.title: Set up analytics
workItems.content: Integrate analytics tools for user tracking.

workItems.title: Develop onboarding screens
workItems.content: Create onboarding screens for new users.

workItems.title: Test push notifications
workItems.content: Verify push notifications work on all devices.

workItems.title: Publish beta version
workItems.content: Release the beta version to selected users.

workItems.title: Brainstorm campaign ideas
workItems.content: Gather creative ideas for the upcoming marketing campaign.

workItems.title: Identify target audience
workItems.content: Define the target audience demographics and interests.

workItems.title: Design social media graphics
workItems.content: Create engaging graphics for social media posts.

workItems.title: Review ad copy
workItems.content: Check and approve the copy for online ads.

workItems.title: Launch email newsletter
workItems.content: Send out the campaign newsletter to subscribers.
